mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_SETTLEMENT A WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001'

SELECT E.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , D.* FROM (SELECT A.SETTLEMENT_NO , A.SETTLEMENT_START_DATE , A.SETTLEMENT_END_DATE , A.TOTAL_SALES , A.COMMISSION_BY_SALES , A.SETTLEMENT_AMT , A.SETTLEMENT_DATE , A.SETTLEMENT_CHK FROM TBL_SETTLEMENT A WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001' ORDER BY A.SETTLEMENT_NO DESC) D ) E WHERE E.RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT MAX(A.SETTLEMENT_END_DATE) AS LAST_END_DATE FROM TBL_SETTLEMENT A WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_DEPOSIT A WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001'

SELECT E.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , D.* FROM (SELECT A.DEPOSIT_NO , A.CORP_NO , A.DEPOSIT_SORT , A.AMOUNT , A.DEPOSIT_DATE , A.DEPOSIT_DETAILS FROM TBL_DEPOSIT A WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001' ORDER BY A.DEPOSIT_NO DESC) D ) E WHERE E.RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT A.CORP_NO , A.CORP_NAME , A.CORP_CONTACTS , A.CORP_EMAIL FROM TBL_CORP_USER A WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CORP_PAYMENT A ( A.CORP_PAY_NO, A.CORP_PAY_UID, A.CORP_NO , A.CORP_PAY_METHOD, A.CORP_PAY_DETAILS , A.CORP_PAY_AMOUNT, A.CORP_PAY_DATE ) VALUES ( 'CRPP' || LPAD(SEQ_CORP_PAYMENT.NEXTVAL,4,0) , #{merchant_uid}, #{buyer_name}, #{pay_method} , #{name}, #{paid_amount}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO TBL_DEPOSIT A ( A.DEPOSIT_NO, A.CORP_NO, A.DEPOSIT_SORT , A.AMOUNT, A.DEPOSIT_DATE, A.DEPOSIT_DETAILS ) VALUES ( 'DEPO' || LPAD(SEQ_DEPOSIT.NEXTVAL,4,0), #{buyer_name}, '충전' , #{paid_amount}, SYSDATE, #{name} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_CORP_PAYMENT A WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001' AND A.CORP_PAY_CHK = 'Y'

SELECT E.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , D.* FROM (SELECT A.CORP_PAY_NO , CASE WHEN A.CORP_PAY_METHOD = 'card' THEN '신용카드' END AS CORP_PAY_METHOD , A.CORP_PAY_DETAILS , A.CORP_PAY_AMOUNT , A.CORP_PAY_DATE FROM TBL_CORP_PAYMENT A WHERE A.CORP_PAY_CHK = 'Y' AND A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0001' ORDER BY A.CORP_PAY_NO DESC) D ) E WHERE E.RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
